item.title: Flyweight Design Pattern
item.description: A problem I had while implementing the “flyweight” design pattern for a lab in my design patterns class. The flyweight design pattern basically has a factory to hold different attributes for example, the attributes of a font which are: – Font: String – Size: Integer – Color: String – Italic: boolean – Bold: Boolean – Row: Integer – Column: Integer To implement the design pattern we must add different fonts to the factory, only if the font is not already in the factory.
